Stay Present and happy meditating!

This is a major update and we're excited to unveil new features.

Please enjoy a completely redesigned Present app! We've added an onboarding flow to help everyone get the most from Present. Also, we've introduced a Meditation of the Day section where you can expect a new meditation every day. We've improved the design and introduced a new "Profile" tab in the main navigation, so you can easily track your progress and achievements.

We've made Present simpler to use and fixed a bunch of bugs along the way.

We hope you enjoy this update and let us know what you think!

Stay Present and happy meditating!

While you are waiting for this update to install, take a few deep breaths and notice what is happening at the moment. We wish you be happy and present!
